Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of Archangel Raphael:

Text.Language: Genea~ niben e~tauswpi: icjen Adam sa e~qoun m~voou: cejimi gar n~Rava/l: efoi n~cobt e~]metrwmi.
Every generation that was: from Adam to this day: finds Raphael: a fortress for mankind.
